programme.title: Hometown Remedy
programme.desc: A busy surgeon heads back home to celebrate her father becoming mayor. But after a chance encounter with the town's only doctor-and most eligible bachelor-she witnesses true compassion which might be the prescription this doctor needs.

programme.title: Just For Showmance
programme.desc: When Tara Thompson’s presenting career begins to stall her PR team encourage her go on a TV show to marry a man she’s never met, her ‘perfect match’ Joe. Tara reluctantly agrees, however goes on secret mission to track down Joe to explain the marriage is just for show.

programme.title: Let Love Grow
programme.desc: Landscape architect Evie has met her match with her new client, stubborn archaeologist Ryan, but his daughters, Zoey and Aria, love Evie, and she soon finds herself the unwitting victim of “Operation Grow a Girlfriend.” As the girls execute their best parent trap schemes, Evie gets to know a new side of Ryan, and she finds herself torn between her ex-boyfriend Mark and this handsome single dad.

programme.title: Love Across Time
programme.desc: While inspecting an old British manor for its real estate potential, Chelsea discovers a portal through time that connects with the late 1700s owner of the property. When an accident occurs, the gentleman comes through and gets stuck in the present day.

programme.title: Christmas Recipe For Romance
programme.desc: The owner of a historic inn decides to enter a prestigious cooking contest to win funds for renovations and get free publicity, but she is a horrible cook. She recruits a renowned chef to help but the kitchen isn't the only thing heating up.

programme.title: Christmas On 5th Avenue
programme.desc: Hopeless romantic Eva Jordan loves everything about Christmas. She even owns her own Christmas concierge in New York City, making the season special for all her fund and eccentric clients. This year as she decorates a spectacular Manhattan Penthouse for Christmas, bubbly Eva Jordan brings moody writer Lucas Blade some joy for the holidays.

programme.title: Christmas Cupcakes
programme.desc: With their family bakery facing foreclosure, two sisters must team-up to try and save it by entering a TV baking competition.

programme.title: Hometown Remedy
programme.desc: A busy surgeon heads back home to celebrate her father becoming mayor. But after a chance encounter with the town's only doctor-and most eligible bachelor-she witnesses true compassion which might be the prescription this doctor needs.

programme.title: Just For Showmance
programme.desc: When Tara Thompson’s presenting career begins to stall her PR team encourage her go on a TV show to marry a man she’s never met, her ‘perfect match’ Joe. Tara reluctantly agrees, however goes on secret mission to track down Joe to explain the marriage is just for show.

programme.title: Austentatious
programme.desc: Elinor eagerly goes with Edward Ferrars, the IRS agent, to an audit. On their way, Elinor’s car has trouble. She and Edward walk back to find help, and have time to get to know each other better. Collin tries a new approach with Lizzie, deciding to be bold, but really just gets in Lizzie’s way. Lizzie also has to juggle Darcy’s numerous calls at all hours for his house hunt. She meets with him and finds out a few more vague details about the house’s intended resident (a mystery woman), and that it’s a birthday gift—which Lizzie has one month to find.

programme.title: Austentatious
programme.desc: Emma is anxious to set up another friend on a date. Grant, Elinor and Lizzie refuse, and counter that they will set Emma up on a date each. Emma endures the worst dates ever at their hands. Lizzie deals with a bad manicure, but that’s nothing to Marianne’s bizarre health condition. Marianne’s skin has taken on a mysterious blue tint, prompting concern from Elinor and her friends about her health. Reluctantly, she agrees to talk to a friend of Grant’s: Brandon. Brandon is a male nurse, and draws a blank about Marianne’s condition, but through Elinor’s wisdom, the unusual—and hilarious--cause is found.

programme.title: Love Across Time
programme.desc: While inspecting an old British manor for its real estate potential, Chelsea discovers a portal through time that connects with the late 1700s owner of the property. When an accident occurs, the gentleman comes through and gets stuck in the present day.

programme.title: The Importance Of Being Mike
programme.desc: Ali's new date seems to catch everything, except for Ali's affection.

programme.title: Christmas Recipe For Romance
programme.desc: The owner of a historic inn decides to enter a prestigious cooking contest to win funds for renovations and get free publicity, but she is a horrible cook. She recruits a renowned chef to help but the kitchen isn't the only thing heating up.

programme.title: Christmas On 5th Avenue
programme.desc: Hopeless romantic Eva Jordan loves everything about Christmas. She even owns her own Christmas concierge in New York City, making the season special for all her fund and eccentric clients. This year as she decorates a spectacular Manhattan Penthouse for Christmas, bubbly Eva Jordan brings moody writer Lucas Blade some joy for the holidays.

programme.title: Christmas Cupcakes
programme.desc: With their family bakery facing foreclosure, two sisters must team-up to try and save it by entering a TV baking competition.

programme.title: Midway to Love
programme.desc: When the network announces that her television therapy show is changing to a tabloid shock-fest, a straight laced and caring psychologist returns to her hometown and reunites with her high school sweetheart while finally realizing that having someone to share a life with is more important than fame and the excitement of the city.
